page.title: 14PUBS+PUB GAMES IN EVERCREECH
page.content: THE EVERCREECH PUBS There are three pubs in the Evercreech area.The Bell Inn,the Brewers Arms and the Shapway.The Bell Inn does good food.There is also the Glen Hotel which is a pub but has accomodation. DARTS Recently Mike Gregory the famous darts player came to Evercreech.Each team plays all the local teams.They get a trophy at the end of the season.They play 56 teams.There are 14 in a team. SKITTLES Once every week people go to play skittles.The skttles are shaped like wine bottles,but they are wood.You have 3 balls to hit them down.There are 5 people in a team.The teams in the league are centered on the pubs.
